title: Injuu Kyoushi (Angel Of Darkness)
synopsis: Atsuko and Sayaka think they have it made when they are both accepted into the same prestigious women`s academy. There, they will be free to explore the intense passion of their relationship, unbounded.
staff: [['Iwakura, Kazunori', ['Character Design']], ['Iino, Toshiaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Ikeda, Yuuji', ['Key Animation']], ['Ishii, Hisashi', ['Key Animation']]]
